name: Dream Machine
description:
Hey there! I have a story to tell you about this one time I became trapped in my subconscious mind! It was quite the strange one, I had to solve puzzles to escape! Luckily I got out unscathed!

Controls: WASD + Space + Mouse + Left Click

Press the "I" key to Invert the Look direction!

Objective: Solve puzzles to escape a weird dream caused by a Dream Machine Malfunction!
